Homicide Rate (per 100,000), 1950–2014
Cite Society and Culture > Crime & Law Enforcement > Crime Data Homicide Rate, 1950–2014 Find the rate for murder and nonnegligent manslaughter per 100,000 people in the United States. Source: AP Photo Year Homicide

rate 1950 4.6 1951 4.4 1952 4.6 1953 4.5 1954 4.2 1955 4.1 1956 4.1 1957 4.0 1958 4.8 1959 4.9 1960 5.1 1961 4.8 1962 4.6 1963 4.6 1964 4.9 1965 5.1 1966 5.6 1967 6.2 1968 6.9 1969 7.3 1970 7.9 1971 8.6 1972 9.0 1973 9.4 1974 9.8 1975 9.6 1976 8.8 1977 8.8 1978 9.0 1979 9.7 1980 10.2 1981 9.8 1982 9.1 1983 8.3 1984 7.9 1985 7.9 1986 8.6 1987 8.3 1988 8.4 1989 8.7 1990 9.4 1991 9.8 1992 9.3 1993 9.5 1994 9.0 1995 8.2 1996 7.4 1997 6.8 1998 6.3 1999 5.7 2000 5.5 2001 5.6 2002 5.6 2003 5.7 2004 5.5 2005 5.9 2006 6.1 2007 5.9 2008 5.4 2009 5.0 2010 4.8 2011 4.7 2012 4.7 2013 4.5 2014 4.5 Source: Crime in the United States, FBI, Uniform Crime Reports.
